channel.title: Mixes on ewen
channel.description: Recent content in Mixes on ewen

item.title: bathing tapes vol. one
item.description: Last month I recorded a studio mix, the first volume of an occasional series for sharing sounds I’m bumping. I’m calling it bathing tapes (don’t sue me, Nigo), ’cos most of the jams shouldn’t sound out of place (or should enhance) if you so decide to give it a spin during an exfoliation session. If not, enjoy the soothing vibes inside wherever you find yourself. Credit and thank you to all the creators of these tracks.
